articles.title: Can Ron Rivera fix the Redskins? His former players think so.
articles.description: A coach who believes in family, Ron Rivera attempts to mend a house of dysfunction.
articles.content:
He made himself available for you, former Panthers cornerback Captain Munnerlyn said. That can help guys trust him and believe in him.

articles.author: Vanessa Gera | AP
articles.title: Bannon protege loses case against liberal Polish newspaper
articles.description: A conservative American activist has lost a defamation case against a Polish journalist who described him as "Trump's man," and as someone therefore indirectly linked to Russian President Vladimir Putin
articles.content:
He sued journalist Tomasz Piatek and Agora, publisher of the liberal Polish newspaper Gazeta Wyborcza, over a 2016 article that described Tyrmand as part of the global war by the right wing against democracy.
Judge Jacek Tyszka rejected Tyrmands argument tha… [+1627 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Cases of mystery respiratory illness in China rise to 44
articles.description: Local health authorities say the number of cases of a newly diagnosed respiratory illness linked to a food market in central China has risen to 44
articles.content: The most common symptom was fever, with shortness of breath and lung infections appearing in a small number of cases, the commission said, without giving further details. Thus far, there have been no clear indications of human-to-human transmission of the dis… [+1705 chars]

articles.title: In clash with Trump administration, House Democrats seek secret grand jury evidence and testimony from former White House counsel Donald McGahn
articles.description: House lawyers say evidence needed for Senate trial and possible new impeachment charges.
articles.content: Even as the timing of an impeachment trial remains uncertain, the House Judiciary Committee is continuing to conduct its inquiry into whether the president committed other impeachable offenses, House lawyers said in court filings in advance of oral argument a… [+4812 chars]

articles.author: Luisa Beck
articles.title: Germany, a model for coming to terms with its past, still struggles with its colonial period
articles.description: In some ways, the precedent of how it has atoned for the Holocaust makes colonial reconciliation more contentious.
articles.content:
Vergangenheitsbewältigung is the term German government officials use to describe Polenzs mission. It means to overcome the past, and its a task embedded in the countrys DNA since World War II.
